title: The Intimate Stranger (1956, UK) Dir: Joseph Losey, Starring Richard Basehart, Constance Cummings - Film Noir Full Movie

sources.title: The Intimate Stranger (1956, UK) Dir: Joseph Losey, Starring Richard Basehart, Constance Cummings - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: The Intimate Stranger is a 1956 British film noir directed by Joseph Losey, under the pseudonym Alec C. Snowden, and starring Richard Basehart, Mary Murphy, Constance Cummings and Roger Livesey. It was released in the USA as Finger of Guilt.
